endpoints.name: Reports Query
endpoints.suffix: /v2/reports?startDate={Start Date:YYYY-MM-DD}&endDate={End Date:YYYY-MM-DD}&ids={ID of YouTube Channel:channel==MINE}&metrics={Metrics:views,likes,dislikes}&currency={Currency?:estimatedRevenue | estimatedAdRevenue | ...}&dimensions={Dimensions?:video,ageGroup,gender}&filters={Filters?:country==IT}&includeHistoricalChannelData={Include Historical Channel Data?:true | false}
